item.title: BplncSIR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BplncSIR1 Gene Name: salt-responsive nuclear lncRNA Genome: Species: Betula platyphylla Functional Descriptions: Birch plants overexpressing and knocking out for BplncSIR1 were generated.

item.title: BramMDH1

item.title: CsSEF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSEF1 Gene Name: putative CCCH-type zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Expression of CsSEF1 gene encoding putative CCCH zinc finger protein is induced by defoliation and prolonged darkness in cucumber fruit.

item.title: CsYUC10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G190380 Gene Symbol: CsYUC10b Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsYUC10b promotes the formation of straight cucumber fruits, with possible applications in the production and breeding of cucumber.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GmMYB84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G234600 Gene Symbol: GmMYB84 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor 84 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Drought Tolerance Conferred in Soybean (Glycine max.

item.title: HVP10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G028910 Gene Symbol: HVP10 Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: This study reveals the molecular mechanism of HVP10 underlying salt tolerance and highlights its potential in improving crop salt tolerance Vacuolar H+-pyrophosphatase HVP10 enhances salt tolerance via promoting Na+ translocation into root vacuoles.

item.title: PdGNC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G229200 Gene Symbol: PdGNC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The GATA transcription factor GNC (PdGNC) plays an important role in photosynthesis and growth in poplar.

item.title: Sl-STIG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-STIG1 Gene Name: STIGMA-SPECIFIC PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato Pistil Factor STIG1 Promotes in Vivo Pollen Tube Growth by Binding to Phosphatidylinositol 3-Phosphate and the Extracellular Domain of the Pollen Receptor Kinase LePRK2.

item.title: TaGS2-2Aa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGS2-2Aa Gene Name: glutamine synthetase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transgenic expression of TaGS2-2Ab significantly increased GS2 abundance and GS activity in leaves.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGS2-2Ab Gene Name: glutamine synthetase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transgenic expression of TaGS2-2Ab significantly increased GS2 abundance and GS activity in leaves.
